name: Abdução ou amor de computador.
description:
This is an acrylic painting on canvas with no frame.
50x50

~~
i started this one couple months ago while i was dealing with the quarantine for covid-s2. sometimes its was a bit lonely, so its about the memoirs of flash i saw on the internet together with
all the images the web could show us. I see myself as the tiger
that its been abducted by those images. 
~~
for this gif, the idea was to evocate a narrative by animating the
parts of the screen. it's an idea to not only show the work, but
to create with it either. 
on my instagram theres a video version with
the song
computer love - kraftwerk. 

gif series
3/10 

nft 1-1. 

~~~~~
By collecting this, i will send you the real screen.
As i am in Brasil, maybe it will take a little long depends where you are. Its gonna be a pleasure to combine the ship with you. 
~~
